label: 惣国準拠
説明文: “Country-wide standard” (sōkoku junkyo) hanzei (Half-payment) was implemented several times across all the provinces under Ōuchi control, beginning with the early years of the Ōnin war.  Sōkoku junkyo was a policy unique to the Ōuchi and their domains, going beyond what was originally intended as a temporary, wartime measure.#[article]Miura Kōsuke. The Half-payment" (Hanzei) system of the Ōuchi Clan."
